title: An Analogue of Holstein-Primakoff and Dyson Realizations for Lie Superalgebras. The Lie superalgebra sl(1/n)
abstract: An analogue of the Holstein-Primakoff and of the Dyson realization for the Lie superalgebra $sl(1/n)$ is written down. The expressions are formally the same as for the Lie algebra $sl(n+1)$, however in the latter the Bose operators have to be replaced with Fermi operators.
